subject: Re: [OFF TOPIC]: Which Java memory analyser do people use?  Was:RE: [junit] Memory Leak in JUnit?
msgSnippet: I have been having a lot of success with JMP http://www.khelekore.org/jmp/ It s open source and free, and can give you a lot of data about your java processes.
messageBody:
I have been having a lot of success with JMP

http://www.khelekore.org/jmp/

It's open source and free, and can give you a lot of data about your
java processes.

CHEERS> SAM

Andrew McDonagh wrote:

>We need to get one for our project and I'd appreciate any opinions people
>have as to which tools are out there, that do the job well.
>
>
